```{r}
carbon_em_ok <-filter(emissions, year >= 2015 & year <= 2021)
save_bee_ok <- filter(save_the_bees, year >= 2015 & year <= 2021)
us_tornado_ok <- filter(us_tornado_dataset_1950_2021, yr >= 2015 & yr <= 2021)

```
